Document:
# Core Rule 1 ## Use common sense.
- The expected behavior is not limited to these rules. - If you are in doubt as to whether something is against the rules, [color=yellow]consult an admin[/color]. - When in doubt, act in [color=green]good faith[/color] and consider the [color=yellow]spirit of the rules[/color].
[italic][color=green]Common sense and good judgment are expected at all times.[/color][/italic]
